About

Greetings!

My interests lie in AI, Image Recognition, and Natural Language Processing in Computer Science. These domains fuel my passion and drive technological advancements.

My Trajectory and Achievements:

  • Leadership in the NASA Lunar Loo Challenge Jr., securing the title of World Champions by engineering a space toilet for lunar environments.
  • Recognition as a Toycathon '21 National Winner among 17,000 projects, dedicated to advancing Sanskrit strategies for Indian youth.
  • Authorship of innovations acknowledged by the Government of India and co-founding ventures like UniPump System and Expressify.


Alongside tech, I explore the intersection of technology and finance, healthcare's transformation via AI, neuromarketing, and mathematical writing.


Beyond academics, I delve into cinematography, philosophy, and find them intellectually enriching.


If you're into these pursuits or seek discourse on tech, finance, neuromarketing, math, movies, or philosophy, let's connect for discussions or collaborations.

Bio

I am currently pursuing a Bachelor's in Technology in Mathematics & Computing Engineering from Delhi Technological University . My passion lies in exploring the convergence of mathematics and computing, seeking to understand their interconnectedness and applications. While I haven't yet ventured into specific research areas or collaborations, I'm enthusiastic about the evolving landscape of technology and its potential. My focus remains dedicated to academic pursuits at Delhi Technological University, where I aim to expand my knowledge and skills in preparation for future contributions to the field of technology and mathematical sciences.

Projects

  • Selected
  • All
Saarathi: Navigating India's COVID-Safe Routes
Tailoring Safe Routes in Real Time, Factoring Population Density, COVID Threats, Containment Zones, and Weather for Secure Navigation.
Pebble AI
Wearable AI pendant for summarization of daily interactions & meetings ensuring enhanced productivity & comprehensive record-keeping.
Cold Fusion Made Possible
Managed to achieve cold fusion by convincing ice cubes to dance with nuclear particles – who knew they had such chemistry? View My 404 Page : )
Data Visualization Portfolio
Unlocking insights and captivating audiences with visually stunning data narratives
